text: Harbour is a 1996 Indian Malayalam film directed by P Anil, Babu Narayanan and starring Vijayaraghavan and Chippy in the lead roles.http://spicyonion.com/title/harbour-malayalam-movie/ ==Plot== It is a story of a happy fisherman's family (Pappachan's) destroyed by Paili's deceitful ways and cunningness. The film explores life in the harbour, and analyses contextual layers of phrases like "The one that bites the hand that feeds," "If an innocent is fooled by a financier, the financier will be fooled by god." In the end, after suffering a great many losses the family finds its spirit of kinship. ==Cast== * Sukumari as Sunnykutty's Appachi * Innocent as Father Sebastian * Thilakan as Pattalam Pappachan * KPAC Lalitha as Annamma * Kalpana as Palisha Kathreena * Baiju as Sunnykutty * Adoor Pankajam as Plamena Ammachi * Bobby Kottarakkara as Vaasu * Chippy as Sophie * Harishree Ashokan as Usman * Mala Aravindan * Paravoor Ramachandran as Chambakkara Paili * Vijayaraghavan as Thommichan *Santhakumari as Beevathumma *KTS Padannayil as Vareechan * Pala Aravindan as Sebasthyashan *Bindu Panikker as Karthyayani *Maathu as Panchami *Sainuddin as Aloshi *Mafia Sasi as Raghavan *T.S.Krishnan *Meena Ganesh as Kaalithalla *Priyanka * Santha Devi ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam- language films
title: Harbour (film)
